title: Can't reconnect and labeled a leaver
body:
I'm a noob so sorry if this is not clear.

Was doing a blind 5v5  and got dropped, could not reconnect but could surf web etc.  so the connection was there.

 Was close to winning the match and after about 15 mins got back on to get no loot and the warning for being afker/leaver.

Is this normal? Is there anything I can do differently? Did my team label me a leaver or the game?

Thank you for any help

replies.body:
Hey, it sounds like you were gone from the match for long enough to be marked as a leaver.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system will not grant rewards or a win (even if your team won), if you get a leave.  

If this issue is still happening, stick to customs for now and run some troubleshooting steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any snags from reaching the game server.  Configuring DNS would be a solid step, but if you're on wifi you'll also want to look into going wired.  I hope that helps!

Your teammates may have reported you, but the system is fairly good at catching people who leave, disconnect, or connect late. Unfortunately, this happens to many people; being disconnected while still having internet access, and still being unable to reconnect. If you ever get punished for something that you believe was unfair or unjustified, you can always argue your case and have someone review it.
